mapper.insert: insert into template(partner_code, template_type, template_name, create_user_id, update_user_id ) values(#{partnerCode}, #{templateType}, #{templateName}, #{userId}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: update template set template_name = #{templateName}, update_user_id = #{userId}, update_date = now() where template_no = #{templateNo}
mapper.insert: insert into template_delivery(template_no, delivery_type, delivery_bundle_flag, charge_type, charge_base, terms_free_charge, payment_type, surcharge_flag, area_code, surcharge_jejudo, surcharge_isolated, unstoring_address, return_address, return_charge, return_delivery_company_code, create_user_id, update_user_id) values(#{templateNo}, #{delivery.deliveryType}, #{delivery.deliveryBundleFlag}, #{delivery.chargeType}, #{delivery.chargeBase}, #{delivery.termsFreeCharge}, #{delivery.paymentType}, #{delivery.surchargeFlag}, #{delivery.areaCode}, #{delivery.surchargeJejudo}, #{delivery.surchargeIsolated}, #{delivery.unstoringAddress}, #{delivery.returnAddress}, #{delivery.returnCharge}, #{delivery.returnDeliveryCompanyCode}, #{userId}, #{userId})
mapper.update: update template_delivery set delivery_type = #{delivery.deliveryType}, delivery_bundle_flag = #{delivery.deliveryBundleFlag}, charge_type = #{delivery.chargeType}, charge_base = #{delivery.chargeBase}, terms_free_charge = #{delivery.termsFreeCharge}, payment_type = #{delivery.paymentType}, surcharge_flag = #{delivery.surchargeFlag}, area_code = #{delivery.areaCode}, surcharge_jejudo = #{delivery.surchargeJejudo}, surcharge_isolated = #{delivery.surchargeIsolated}, unstoring_address = #{delivery.unstoringAddress}, return_address = #{delivery.returnAddress}, return_charge = #{delivery.returnCharge}, return_delivery_company_code = #{delivery.returnDeliveryCompanyCode}, update_user_id = #{userId}, update_date = now() where template_no = #{templateNo}
mapper.insert: insert into template_guide(template_no, template_guide, create_user_id, update_user_id) values(#{templateNo}, #{templateGuide}, #{userId}, #{userId})
mapper.update: update template_guide set template_guide = #{templateGuide}, update_user_id = #{userId}, update_date = now() where template_no = #{templateNo}
mapper.select: select t.template_type, t.template_name, g.template_guide, d.delivery_type, d.delivery_bundle_flag, d.charge_type, d.charge_base, d.terms_free_charge, d.payment_type, d.surcharge_flag, d.area_code, d.surcharge_jejudo, d.surcharge_isolated, d.unstoring_address, d.return_address, d.return_charge, d.return_delivery_company_code from template t left join template_guide g on t.template_no = g.template_no left join template_delivery d on t.template_no = d.template_no where t.template_no = #{templateNo}
